scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.includes('npm')) throw new Error('Please use Bun with this project: https://bun.sh')"
scripts.typecheck:all: bun run --cwd packages/playtest typecheck & bun run --cwd packages/play typecheck & bun run --cwd packages/text-adventure typecheck & bun run --cwd packages/compact-adventure typecheck
scripts.test:all: bun run --cwd packages/playtest test & bun run --cwd packages/text-adventure test & bun run --cwd packages/compact-adventure test
scripts.test:coverage:all: bun run --cwd packages/playtest test:coverage & bun run --cwd packages/text-adventure test:coverage & bun run --cwd packages/compact-adventure test:coverage
